sayings.content: Life isn't about waiting for the storm to pass, it's about learning to dance in the rain.
sayings.author: Vivian Greene

sayings.content: Live simply, pursue inner peace and contentment.
What matters most in life is not what happens to you, but how you respond to it.
Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.
sayings.author: John Lennon

sayings.content: In the end, it's not the years in your life that count. It's the life in your years.
sayings.author: Abraham Lincoln

sayings.content: Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated.
sayings.author: Confucius

sayings.content: The purpose of our lives is to be happy.
sayings.author: Dalai Lama

sayings.content: Life is either a daring adventure or nothing at all.
sayings.author: Helen Keller

sayings.content: Life is 10% what happens to you and 90% how you react to it.
sayings.author: Charles R. Swindoll

sayings.content: The good life is one inspired by love and guided by knowledge.
sayings.author: Bertrand Russell

sayings.content: Life is a succession of lessons which must be lived to be understood.
sayings.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

sayings.content: The unexamined life is not worth living.
sayings.author: Socrates

sayings.content: Life is a flower of which love is the honey.
sayings.author: Victor Hugo

sayings.content: Life is not a problem to be solved, but a reality to be experienced.
sayings.author: Søren Kierkegaard

sayings.content: Life is short, and it's up to you to make it sweet.
sayings.author: Sarah Louise Delany

sayings.content: The biggest adventure you can take is to live the life of your dreams.
sayings.author: Oprah Winfrey

sayings.content: Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance, you must keep moving.
sayings.author: Albert Einstein

sayings.content: Life is a mirror and will reflect back to the thinker what he thinks into it.
sayings.author: Ernest Holmes

sayings.content: Life is a great big canvas, and you should throw all the paint on it you can.
sayings.author: Danny Kaye

sayings.content: Life is a journey that must be traveled no matter how bad the roads and accommodations.
sayings.author: Oliver Goldsmith

sayings.content: Life is a series of natural and spontaneous changes. Don't resist them - that only creates sorrow.
sayings.author: Lao Tzu

sayings.content: Life is a dream for the wise, a game for the fool, a comedy for the rich, a tragedy for the poor.
sayings.author: Sholom Aleichem

sayings.content: Life is a song - sing it. Life is a game - play it. Life is a challenge - meet it.
sayings.author: Sri Sathya Sai Baba

sayings.content: Life is a beautiful melody, only the lyrics are messed up.
sayings.author: Hans Christian Andersen

sayings.content: Life is a ticket to the greatest show on earth.
sayings.author: Martin H. Fischer

sayings.content: Life is a question and how we live it is our answer.
sayings.author: Gary Keller

sayings.content: Life is a process of becoming, a combination of states we have to go through.
sayings.author: Anaïs Nin

sayings.content: Life is a balance between holding on and letting go.
sayings.author: Rumi

sayings.content: Life is a one time offer, use it well.
Life is a gift, and it offers us the privilege, opportunity, and responsibility to give something back.
sayings.author: Tony Robbins

sayings.content: Life is a book and there are a thousand pages I have not yet read.
sayings.author: Cassandra Clare

sayings.content: Life is a puzzle, and every piece counts.
Life is a canvas, and you are the artist.
